meanings.definition: A meal that combines breakfast and lunch.
meanings.sent1: On Sundays, our family enjoys delicious brunches together.
meanings.sent2: Many restaurants offer brunches on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The brunches at the new cafe are so tasty!
meanings.sent4: Her brunches are like a culinary adventure.
meanings.sent5: I always look forward to the brunches with my friends.

meanings.sent1: Let's brunches at that cozy cafe tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She brunches every Sunday with her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: We should brunches at that new place everyone is talking about.
meanings.sent4: Brunches with friends is a great way to catch up.
meanings.sent5: I love to brunches on lazy weekends.
